languages.text: Солдаты сеют панику в рядах противника на расстоянии. Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} солдата, Стрельба на бегу, дает (2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и позволяет ему совершать дополнительную атаку за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Такая атака будет стоить на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. Однако с момента активации способности и до конца своего следующего хода солдат получает эффект "восстановление дыхания". На время его действия солдат получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и не может использовать Стрельбу на бегу.

Soldiers sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Run and Gun grants them +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and lets them make one more attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This attack will cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. However, from the moment the Soldier activates this ability and until the end of their next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, they suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.
languages.original_text: Солдаты сеют панику в рядах противника на расстоянии. Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} солдата, Стрельба на бегу, дает (2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и позволяет ему совершать дополнительную атаку за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Такая атака будет стоить на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. Однако с момента активации способности и до конца своего следующего хода солдат получает эффект "восстановление дыхания". На время его действия солдат получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и не может использовать Стрельбу на бегу.

traits.locale_text: Marksmen sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone ability Shot on the Run grants them +(2 + AGI bonus / 2) MP and lets them make one more attack per round at a −10 penalty to their Ballistic Skill. This attack will cost −1 AP less (but no less than 1 AP).

Marksmen sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone ability Shot on the Run grants them +(2 + AGI bonus / 2) MP and lets them make one more attack per round at a −10 penalty to their Ballistic Skill. This attack will cost −1 AP less (but no less than 1 AP).

Marksmen sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone ability Shot on the Run grants them +(2 + AGI bonus / 2) MP and lets them make one more attack per round at a −10 penalty to their Ballistic Skill. This attack will cost −1 AP less (but no less than 1 AP).

Soldiers sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Run and Gun grants them +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and lets them make one more attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This attack will cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. However, from the moment the Soldier activates this ability and until the end of their next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, they suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.

languages.text: Soldaten verbreiten aus der Ferne Panik in den feindlichen Reihen. Ihre Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Laufen und ballern gewährt ihnen +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und lässt sie pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} einen weiteren Angriff ausführen. Dieser Angriff kostet −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger. Sobald der Soldat diese Fähigkeit aktiviert und bis zum Ende seines nächsten Zugs gerät der Soldat jedoch außer Atem. Der Effekt „Außer Atem“ bewirkt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und verhindert den Einsatz von Laufen und ballern.
languages.original_text: Soldiers sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Run and Gun grants them +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and lets them make one more attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This attack will cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. However, from the moment the Soldier activates this ability and until the end of their next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, they suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.

traits.locale_text: Scharfschützen säen unter Feinden aus der Ferne Panik. Ihre wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, Auf der Flucht erschossen, gewährt ihnen +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und lässt sie ein weiteres Mal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} bei {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} angreifen. Dieser Angriff kostet -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger (aber nicht weniger als 1 AP).

languages.text: Les Soldats sèment la panique à distance dans les rangs de l’ennemi. Leur {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé, Tir à la volée leur octroie +(2 + bonus d’{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et leur permet d’effectuer une attaque supplémentaire par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cette attaque coûtera 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins. Cependant, dès qu’un Soldat active cette capacité, et jusqu’à la fin de son prochain tour, il devient Essoufflé. Tant qu’il subit l’effet Essoufflé, le Soldat subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10 à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} et ne peut plus utiliser Tir à la volée.
languages.original_text: Soldiers sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Run and Gun grants them +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and lets them make one more attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This attack will cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. However, from the moment the Soldier activates this ability and until the end of their next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, they suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.

traits.locale_text: Les Tireurs d'Élite sèment à distance la panique dans les rangs ennemis. Leur {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé Tir en Courant leur confère +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et leur permet d'effectuer une attaque supplémentaire par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10 de leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}. Cette attaque coûte -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins (mais pas moins de 1 PA).

languages.text: 士兵可以从远处向敌人散播死亡。士兵的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}奔袭射击，可以让其额外获得（2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内可以额外进行一次攻击。此次额外攻击消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点（最低1点）。 然而，激活此能力后，士兵会陷入疲惫状态，效果持续至下个回合结束为止。在疲惫状态下，士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}会受到-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，且无法再次使用奔袭射击。
languages.original_text: Soldiers sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Run and Gun grants them +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and lets them make one more attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This attack will cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. However, from the moment the Soldier activates this ability and until the end of their next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, they suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.

traits.locale_text: 神射手可以从远处向敌人散播死亡。神射手的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：奔袭射击，可以让其额外获得（2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}回合{/g}内可以额外进行一次攻击，但{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}在此次射击中会降低10点。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g} 此次额外攻击消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点（最低1点）。

languages.text: Los soldados guardan las distancias para sembrar el pánico en las filas enemigas. Su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave, Disparo a la carrera, les concede +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y les permite realizar un ataque más por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. El ataque cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos. Sin embargo, desde que el soldado activa esta capacidad hasta el final de su siguiente turno, se queda sin aliento. Mientras está sin aliento, sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} −10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y no puede usar Disparo a la carrera.
languages.original_text: Soldiers sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Run and Gun grants them +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and lets them make one more attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This attack will cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. However, from the moment the Soldier activates this ability and until the end of their next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, they suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.

traits.locale_text: Los tiradores de élite guardan las distancias para sembrar el pánico en las filas enemigas. Su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave, Disparo a la carrera, les concede +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y les permite realizar un ataque más por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 en su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. Este ataque consume −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos (pero no será nunca menos de 1 PA).

languages.original_text: Riflemen sow panic in enemy ranks from a distance. Shooters' key ability, Rifle Shooting, gives them (2 + LOV bonus / 2) OP and allows them to make an additional attack per turn with a -10 penalty to Ranged Combat. This attack will cost 1 OD less (but not less than 1 OD).

languages.text: 兵士は遠距離から敵にパニックを引き起こすことができる。彼らの主要{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}であるラン＆ガンでは+(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得し、各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}につき、攻撃を1回多く行える。この攻撃の消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}は-1少なくなる。 ただし、このアビリティを発動した兵士は次のターン終了まで、息切れ状態となり、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、ラン＆ガンを使用できなくなる。
languages.original_text: Soldiers sow panic in the enemy ranks from afar. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Run and Gun grants them +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and lets them make one more attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This attack will cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. However, from the moment the Soldier activates this ability and until the end of their next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, they suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.

traits.locale_text: マークスマンは遠距離から敵にパニックを引き起こすことができる。彼らの主要{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}であるショット・オン・ランでは+(2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}/2){g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得し、各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}に対して−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で1回追加の攻撃ができるようになる。 この攻撃では{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費が−1少なくなる（ただし1AP以上にはならない)。
